import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import mrCash from './assets/images/mr-cash-flying.png'; import mrCashTall from './assets/images/mrcashtall.png'; import header from './assets/images/header-bubble.svg'; import button from './assets/images/get-offer-button.svg'; import car from './assets/images/automobile.svg'; import offer from './assets/images/offer.svg'; import money from './assets/images/money-bag.svg'; import './assets/scss/home.scss'; class Home extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { isLoaded: false, error: false } } render() { return (

How it works

Enter information about your vehicle.

Enter your vehicles vin or year, make, model, and trim and answer a few questions about your vehicle.

Get an instant estimated offer.

Receive an estimated offer based on what you submitted. You will receive a email with the official offer within 24 hours.

Get paid!

We come to you to pick up the vehicle and if the inspection provided by us checks out you get paid on the spot!

) } } export default Home;
